data.name: Godzilla vs. Gigan
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

When giant alien insects from a dying planet plot to take the earth for themselves, only Godzilla can stop them! But when these evil space bugs use the monsters King Ghidorah and Gigan to carry out their plan, Godzilla will need some help from his friend Anguirus to save the day. It’s about to be an all-out monster brawl as Godzilla takes on one of his trickiest enemies yet!
data.about_the_game: When giant alien insects from a dying planet plot to take the earth for themselves, only Godzilla can stop them! But when these evil space bugs use the monsters King Ghidorah and Gigan to carry out their plan, Godzilla will need some help from his friend Anguirus to save the day. It’s about to be an all-out monster brawl as Godzilla takes on one of his trickiest enemies yet!
data.short_description: Godzilla and his former adversary, Angorus, team up to battle against the three-headed dragon Ghidrah and one of his toughest enemies, the space monster Gigan.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
